DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text that specifies another fundoscopic abnormality not previously mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The organ of sight or vision._A technique used to examine of the back (fundus) and other anatomical structures of the eye with a magnifying instrument._Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.
